entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Val-d'Or Regional Airport 5:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.6°C
Wind: NW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late in the evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
